title: (x) Arabian Nights - Abbott Oldstyle {Mark S}
content:
Does anyone know what font this is...   
   
 ![font photo](http://web.archive.org/web/20101017084033im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28777.jpg)   
   
...and where I may be able to get it (preferrably free, if possible)?? I need it ASAP. I REALLY appreciate any help...   
   
thanks -
author: opiumink

comments.content: It's an old face called Abbott Oldstyle. There does not seem to be a commercial source for it in digital format, at least under that name.

It doesn't help with the desire for free or ASAP, but a Softmaker/ATF   
version of Abbott Oldstyle may be found on the [Fontsite CD](http://web.archive.org/web/20101017084033/http:/www.fontsite.com/Pages/FFDownloads.html).
well, i appreciate the help you've given thus far. if anyone has any other info, i'd appreciate it.
The Fontbank version of this font, called Abbess, can be obtained [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20101017084033/http:/www.grannysattic-plus.com/Fonts/A2.htm).
wow. thank you so much. i really appreciate it.
